Text: Thanks for the informative sessionDear Mr Hayslett My name is Gertrude Onuoha and I am currently a senior at the University of Houston graduating with a degree in Finance in December of this year I had the wonderful opportunity to meet you yesterday at the information session held at the Shamrock Ballroom at the Hilton at University of Houston ground I would like to use this medium to let you know that the reception was very informative and to thank you for such an excellent presentation I would also like to reiterate my interest in a position with Enron Enclosed is another copy of my resume for your review I have also selected Enron at the Univerisity of Houston Career website and I would definitely welcome an opportunity for an interview Thanks once again and have a great day Sincerely Gertrude Onuoha
